Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Hmm this is a complex open-ended question about process optimization The user has provided a detailed pseudo-BPMN diagram and wants a comprehensive redesign proposal

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I need to break this down systematically The core requirements are reducing turnaround times and increasing flexibility for non-standard requests The three key enabler themes are automation dynamic resource allocation and predictive analytics

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me structure the response around the original process flow while addressing each of these themes Ill start with the initial request intake and classification since thats where predictive analytics could have the biggest impact Then Ill move through the parallel checks customization handling and approval workflows suggesting automation and flexibility improvements at each stage

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: The challenge will be balancing the proposed changes with operational complexity I should include a section on trade-offs and implementation considerations The response should be detailed but not overly technical focusing on practical improvements that align with the stated goals

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: I notice the original diagram has some logical gaps like what happens after the standard path so Ill need to make reasonable assumptions while proposing enhancements
